TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDataProvider extends System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class XmlDataProvider Inherits DataSourceProvider Implements IUriContext
type XmlDataProvider = class inherit DataSourceProvider interface IUriContext

summary.span: 允许以声明方式访问数据绑定的 XML 数据。

span.span: Enables declarative access to XML data for data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 在部分信任沙箱中， 当它没有访问给定数据的权限时，将失败。In a partial-trust sandbox, fails when it does not have permissions to access the given data. 有关部分信任安全的详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 部分信任安全性](/dotnet/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security)。For more information about partial trust security, see [WPF Partial Trust Security](/dotnet/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security). 公开以下访问 XML 数据的方式。 exposes the following ways to access XML data. - 您可以使用类嵌入内联 XML 数据 。You can embed inline XML data using the class. - 您可以将 属性设置为 XML 数据文件的。You can set the property to the of an XML data file. - 可以将属性设置 为 。You can set the property to an . 在事件发生时对所有绑定执行完全刷新 。 performs a full refresh of all bindings when a event occurs. 没有针对特定节点的优化。There are no optimizations for specific nodes. 默认情况下，属性设置为 `true` ，这意味着在 默认情况下将检索数据并异步生成 XML 节点的集合。The property is set to `true` by default, which means that the retrieves data and produces the collection of XML nodes asynchronously by default.

span.span: x:XData XAML Directive Element

summary.span: 准备加载内联 XML 或外部 XML 文件以生成 XML 节点的集合。

span.span: Prepares the loading of either the inline XML or the external XML file to produce a collection of XML nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在后台线程上，执行是立即执行的，而不是基于属性的值 。The execution is either immediate or on a background thread, based on the value of the property. 此方法由 基类的和 方法调用。This method is called by the and methods of the base class.

summary.span: 获取或设置要用作绑定源的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to use as the binding source.
The to use as the binding source.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开以下访问 XML 数据的方式。 exposes the following ways to access XML data. - 您可以使用类嵌入内联 XML 数据 。You can embed inline XML data using the class. - 您可以将 属性设置为 XML 数据文件的。You can set the property to the of an XML data file. - 可将此属性设置为 。You can set this property to an . 在事件发生时对所有绑定执行完全刷新 。 performs a full refresh of all bindings on when a event occurs. 没有针对特定节点的优化。There are no optimizations for specific nodes. 如果 设置了属性，则会丢弃任何内联 XML 数据。If the property is set, then any inline XML data is discarded. 如果 设置了属性，则 会清除属性并放弃任何内联 XML 数据。If the property is set, then the property is cleared and any inline XML data is discarded. 设置以下属性将隐式导致此 对象刷新： 、 、 和 。Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this object to refresh: , , , and . 更改多个刷新导致的属性时，建议使用 。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ShouldSerialize`提供此方法是因为 属性没有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已更改为其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果要开发的设计器 或开发自己的包含的控件，通常需要调用此方法 。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开以下访问 XML 数据的方式。 exposes the following ways to access XML data. - 您可以使用类嵌入内联 XML 数据 。You can embed inline XML data using the class. - 您可以将此属性设置为 XML 数据文件的。You can set this property to the of an XML data file. - 可以将属性设置 为 。You can set the property to an . 如果 设置了属性，则会丢弃任何内联 XML 数据。If the property is set, then any inline XML data is discarded. 如果 设置了属性，则 会清除属性并放弃任何内联 XML 数据。If the property is set, then the property is cleared and any inline XML data is discarded. 设置以下属性将隐式导致此 对象刷新： 、 、 和 。Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this object to refresh: , , , and . 更改多个刷新导致的属性时，建议使用 。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended. ## Examples 在某些应用程序中，在 XAML 页中嵌入 XML 会很不方便，因为在编译时必须知道数据的确切内容。In some applications, embedding the XML inline within the XAML page can be inconvenient because the exact content of the data must be known at compile time. 因此，您可以从外部 XML 文件获取数据，如以下示例中所示。Therefore, you can obtain the data from an external XML file, as in the following example. [!code-xaml[XMLDataSource2#XmlFileExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XmlDataSource2/CS/Window1.xaml#xmlfileexample)] 如果 XML 数据位于远程 XML 文件中，则可以通过为属性分配相应的 URL 来定义对数据的访问权限，如下所示 ：If the XML data resides in a remote XML file, you define access to the data by assigning an appropriate URL to the attribute as follows: ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XmlSerializer As IXmlSerializable

summary.span: 获取内联 XML 内容。

span.span: Gets the inline XML content.
The inline XML content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分析器使用此属性来编译嵌入 XML 数据岛的文本内容。This property is used by the parser to compile the literal content of the embedded XML data island. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` --or-- ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *elementDataRoot**elementDataRoot* 必需。Required. 括起来的数据岛的单个根元素。The single root element of the enclosed data island. 如果没有一个根， `x:XData` 则作为数据源无效。Without a single root, the `x:XData` is invalid as a data source. *elementData**elementData* 可选。Optional. 表示数据的 XML。XML that represents your data. 任意数量的元素都可以包含为元素数据，嵌套元素可以包含在其他元素中，依此类推，这取决于 XML 的一般规则。Any number of elements can be contained as element data, nested elements can be contained in other elements, and so on, subject to the general rules of XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法处理 `XPath` 属性中的表达式 。The method handles the `XPath` expressions from the property. `XPath` 不支持函数。`XPath` functions are not supported. 有关 `XPath` 表达式信息，请参阅 " 示例" 部分中提供的文档和一些示例。For `XPath` expression information, see the documentation and some examples provided in the Example section. 设置以下属性将隐式导致此 对象刷新： 、 、 和 。Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this object to refresh: , , , and . 更改多个刷新导致的属性时，建议使用 。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended.
